attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. This is an amazing family vehicle. It is incredibly spacious, very comfortable and packed full of great tech and comfort features. This great vehicle is low mileage and has room to put a lot more kms on the clock. It is still in very good condition, is reliable, has a powerful diesel engine, yet is still quite light on fuel and is cost effective to maintain.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.
